text: Jamiyah (Arabic: جَاَمِيَ) means gathering in the Arabic language. It is also used to refer to the book Al-Jami'a or used to refer to a masjid. It is also used to refer to the western style university while madrasa is used to refer to an Islamic style university."Djamia", in Encyclopaedia of Islam, 2nd edition, Brill, 2012 == References == Category:Islamic terminology
title: Jamiyah
